intro: Sagitta major, commonly known as the arrowhead plant, is a species of flowering plant native to tropical and subtropical regions. It belongs to the family Araceae, which includes plants like philodendrons and peace lilies. The plant is characterized by its heart-shaped leaves and striking spadix inflorescence.
